resources.string: Look at your tablet to unlock it.

"Keep these things in mind:
"
"Face Unlock is less secure than a pattern, PIN or password.
"
Someone who looks similar to you could unlock your tablet."
"
The data used to identify your face is kept private on the tablet."
"

" "
"Find an indoor spot - not too bright or too dim.
"
Hold the tablet at eye level."
"

"To unlock your tablet, just look at it.
Tip: Improve face matching by having your face captured in different conditions."

"Examples:
"
"In different lighting
"
With or without prescription glasses"
"
Bearded or clean-shaven"
"" Hold the tablet at eye level."
